title: Chapter 710 - Nothing Can Stand In His Way
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 710 - Nothing Can Stand In His Way

Wen Rufeng was dead!

Despite joining forces with four other Spiritual Revolution Realm cultivators, Su Yi had cut him down!

This bloody spectacle swept through the crowd’s hearts like a hurricane, stirring up waves of shock.

“A Spiritual Revolution Realm existence was cut down, just like that…” Mi Tianhe’s lips quivered, and his heart shook.

“Was that really the power of a Spiritual Manifestation Realm cultivator?” Pu Surong’s expression froze. She, too, was stunned.

Spiritual Manifestation and Spiritual Revolution were two realms apart!

Who’d dare believe that a Spiritual Manifestation youth of the Azure Continent could cross two realms to kill a Spiritual Revolution expert even while outnumbered?

The cultivators of the ancient factions were, without exception, astonished and terrified.

Especially Zhou Zhi, who Su Yi had defeated and injured to the brink of death earlier. He was completely dumbstruck, and he trembled, unable to accept what he was seeing.

Meanwhile, on Mount Heavenbristle.

When the Xia Emperor saw this, even he couldn’t help but gasp. He swept his gaze across Wen Xinzhao, Weng Jiu, and the others. They too were as shaken as could be.

However, Huan Tianxu and the other Spiritual...
original_title: Chapter 710 - Nothing Can Stand in His Way
